item.Ecom.Product.Name: GT Mach One Pro BMX Bike
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: Take flight in this pro-level BMX racing bike! Built for aggressive speed, this tough machine will have you flyin’ around the track in no time flat!
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: Take flight in this pro-level BMX racing bike! Built for aggressive speed, this tough machine will have you flyin’ around the track in no time flat!
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• Heavy-duty steel frame and chromoly fork provide extra strength and resilience
  • Steel 3-piece crank offers the stiffness, durability and power you need to make the next double
  • Tektro V-brakes for strong, easy braking
  • Overbuilt wheels with GT Brody Knob tires are built tough to withstand all sorts of abuse
  • Includes pad set

item.Ecom.Product.Name: GT Marathon 2.0 Mountain Bike
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: This bike will have you turning those “short afternoon rides” into “epic trail runs” thanks to its climb-friendly setup! GT’s patented Independent Drivetrain system eliminates pedal feedback, so you can go longer and harder. Add on the bump-absorbing, dual suspension from Rock Shox and Fox, a Shimano 27-speed drivetrain, disc wheels and Kenda tires that grip like a vice, and you’ll start to wonder how you ever rode less than four hours a day!
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: This bike will have you turning those “short afternoon rides” into “epic trail runs” thanks to its climb-friendly setup! GT’s patented Independent Drivetrain system eliminates pedal feedback, so you can go longer and harder. Add on the bump-absorbing, dual suspension from Rock Shox and Fox, a Shimano 27-speed drivetrain, disc wheels and Kenda tires that grip like a vice, and you’ll start to wonder how you ever rode less than four hours a day!
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• Lightweight, durable aluminum frame with i-Drive system provides unbeatable pedaling power and efficiency
  • 4” of rear wheel travel offer comfort and control over uneven terrain
  • Rock Shox Recon 351 Air front suspension paired up with Fox Float R rear shock smoothes out all the rough stuff on the trail
  • Shimano LX 27-speed drivetrain delivers sharp, powerful shifts and includes plenty of gears for the hills and flats
  • Ritchey aluminum handlebar, stem and seatpost for core-level strength, style and performance
  • Hydraulic disc brakes supply excellent stopping power in any condition
  • Crank Brothers Candy C pedals add stability and easy in/easy out convenience
  • WTB Rocket V Comp saddle offers plenty of cushioning for day-long rides
  • WTB SpeedDisc XC rims with Kenda Nevegal tires flatten every obstacle in your path and are built to withstand all sorts of abuse

item.Ecom.Product.Name: GT Transeo 1.0 Comfort Bike
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: The Transeo 1.0 has everything you’ve been looking for! It’s lightweight, thanks to the 7005 aluminum frame with hydroformed top tube and cold forged 3D dropouts. It’s fast, due to the 700c wheels that’ll keep you on the go. It’s powerful, because the linear-pull brakes will stop you in your tracks. It’s comfortable, because it boasts an anatomical saddle and soft grips. Each of these features compliments the upright geometry and ergonomics of this fitness machine perfectly.
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: The Transeo 1.0 has everything you’ve been looking for! It’s lightweight, thanks to the 7005 aluminum frame with hydroformed top tube and cold forged 3D dropouts. It’s fast, due to the 700c wheels that’ll keep you on the go. It’s powerful, because the linear-pull brakes will stop you in your tracks. It’s comfortable, because it boasts an anatomical saddle and soft grips. Each of these features compliments the upright geometry and ergonomics of this fitness machine perfectly.
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• GT 7000 Series butted aluminum frame with Sport Fitness Geometry is built for lightweight speed and durable comfort
  • Suspension fork smoothes out the rough stuff on the road or trail
  • Shimano/SRAM 27-speed drivetrain with RapidFire shifting gives you quick access to plenty of gearing options
  • Selle San Marco Ischia K saddle and dual density grips add comfort over uneven terrain
  • ProMax direct-pull brakes provide excellent stopping power
  • WTB All Terrainasaurus tires are perfect for rough roads and packed trails
  • Double wall Alex rims with Shimano hubs maintain strength and rigidity

item.Ecom.Product.Name: GTw Avalanche 3.0 Disc Ladies
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: Ready to play in the dirt? This confidence building, off-road hardtail with proven technology and a women’s specific fit delivers a ton of fun at a trickled down price!
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: Ready to play in the dirt? This confidence building, off-road hardtail with proven technology and a women’s specific fit delivers a ton of fun at a trickled down price!
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• GT 6061 Triple Triangle frame increases pedaling efficiency and dampens road vibration while remaining lightweight, stiff and tough
  • Women’s Specific Geometry is shaped with a taller head tube, steeper seat tube angle and shorter top tube length for a customized fit
  • 100mm of smooth front suspension absorbs bumps and adds control to your ride
  • Shimano Alivio 24-speed drivetrain with RapidFire shifters gives you several, easy gear options for hilly terrain
  • WTB Speed She saddle and anatomical grips enhance comfort without compromising performance
  • Tektro IO mechanical disc brakes provide low maintenance, all-weather stopping power
  • Durable aluminum wheels with Kenda Nevegal tires take hold of any trail with a vengeance

item.Ecom.Product.Name: Mongoose Commuter Bike
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: A ‘Goose that’s equally at home on a rural bike path as it is in a city center, the new Kaldi Double is ready for commuting and taking in the sights!
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: A ‘Goose that’s equally at home on a rural bike path as it is in a city center, the new Kaldi Double is ready for commuting and taking in the sights!
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• Heat treated aluminum frame with comfort geometry gives you a lightweight, resilient ride that’s easy on your back and hands
  • Shimano 24-speed drivetrain offers plenty of gear options for casual riders and commuters
  • Mongoose/Velo Comfort Design saddle and Ergo Comfort Dual Density grips keep you well cushioned and composed throughout your ride
  • Tektro 837 linear-pull brakes provide perfectly modulated stopping power
  • Continental Sport Contact tires combine excellent handling with a durable and supple riding experience
  • Insulated mug with aluminum handlebar cage is perfect for transporting your favorite beverage
  • Full fenders keep your ride clean, dry and eliminate “spray” in wet conditions

item.Ecom.Product.Name: Mongoose Ritual Dirt-Hi Mountain Bike
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: If you head to the woods with the full knowledge that you’re not coming back out in the same shape that you left…then quite possibly, we have your perfect ride! This chromoly-loaded bike takes to the air with incredible ease yet is built tough to absorb those inevitable hard landings. And with 100mm of front suspension, Sun Ditch Witch rims, FSA cranks and SRAM componentry, this bike will have no problem surviving anything you throw its way…but the question is, will you?
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: If you head to the woods with the full knowledge that you’re not coming back out in the same shape that you left…then quite possibly, we have your perfect ride! This chromoly-loaded bike takes to the air with incredible ease yet is built tough to absorb those inevitable hard landings. And with 100mm of front suspension, Sun Ditch Witch rims, FSA cranks and SRAM componentry, this bike will have no problem surviving anything you throw its way…but the question is, will you?
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• Heavy-duty chromoly frame provides extra strength for jumps on the trail
  • Marzocchi Dirt Jumper 2 fork offers 100mm of plush suspension to absorb those heavy hits
  • FSA Moto X cranks with PC bashguard are built tough and strong for all your freeride escapades
  • SRAM X.5 9-speed rear shifter and SRAM X.7 derailleur blend smooth shifting action with quick and precise performance
  • Funn handlebar and stem with SDG seatpost and saddle supply core-level resilience that’s nearly indestructible
  • Hayes Stroker Trail hydraulic disc brakes with a lightweight and compact design deliver powerful stopping performance
  • Kenda Small Block Eight front tire and Kenda K-Rad rear tire give you the stability, traction and aggressive construction you need for dirt jumping
  • Sun Ditch Witch rims with Mongoose rear disc hubs are built to withstand those tough hits
  • Removable rim brake mounts let you run V-brakes just in case you bust or bend your rotor

item.Ecom.Product.Name: Mongoose Sabrosa Commuter Bike
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: For those to ride to work everyday, this bike is the next best thing to a warm cup of coffee early in the A.M. The single speed drivetrain with disc brakes means you don’t have to think that hard or that much about maintenance – which is always a good thing before the caffeine hits. Solid aluminum frame puts you in a comfortable riding position while the durable wheelset and tires will get you through traffic, dirt or over manhole covers with ease.
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: For those to ride to work everyday, this bike is the next best thing to a warm cup of coffee early in the A.M. The single speed drivetrain with disc brakes means you don’t have to think that hard or that much about maintenance – which is always a good thing before the caffeine hits. Solid aluminum frame puts you in a comfortable riding position while the durable wheelset and tires will get you through traffic, dirt or over manhole covers with ease.
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• Lightweight aluminum frame with comfort geometry makes cycling a breeze
  • Single speed drivetrain is simple and uncomplicated to maintain
  • Mechanical disc brakes provide low maintenance, all-weather stopping power
  • Bio-Tuned ergo bar ends offer comfortable positioning
  • Durable and responsive wheelset can go from pavement to trail effortlessly
  • Includes a stainless steel coffee thermos with cage

item.Ecom.Product.Name: Mongoose Supergoose Cruiser BMX
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: Now parents can hit the track with their kids on this 24” BMX bike!
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: Now parents can hit the track with their kids on this 24” BMX bike!
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• 6061 aluminum frame with chromoly fork delivers tough-as-nails performance while remaining exceptionally light and rigid
  • 3-piece tubular chromoly cranks guarantee a stiff and durable ride
  • T.H.E. Dice saddle won’t get in your way when you’re racin’ or just showing off
  • Tektro V-brakes offer excellent stopping power
  • Kenda Small Block tires with smaller knobs provide incredible grip and traction
  • Overbuilt Alex F303 rims with 36H aluminum hubs withstand all sorts of abuse
  • Protective T.H.E. padset and number plate are the perfect accessories for your next race

item.Ecom.Product.Name: Mongoose Supergoose Elite BMX Bike
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: The same bike ridden by the 2008 China Olympic BMX Team!
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: The same bike ridden by the 2008 China Olympic BMX Team!
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• 6061 aluminum frame with chromoly fork delivers tough-as-nails performance while remaining exceptionally light and rigid
  • 3-piece tubular chromoly cranks with a 44T aluminum crank guarantee a light, stiff and durable ride
  • T.H.E. Dice saddle won’t get in your way when you’re racin’ or just showing off
  • Tektro 930 V-brakes offer excellent stopping power
  • Kenda Small Block tires with smaller knobs provide incredible grip and traction
  • Alienation PBR race rimes with 36H sealed aluminum hubs are perfect for jumping and racing
  • Protective T.H.E. padset and number plate are the perfect accessories for your next race

item.Ecom.Product.Name: Mongoose Teocali Comp Freeride
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: No matter what the trail throws your way, this bike will give you the confidence to tackle what’s ahead. Freeride suspension platform delivers smooth, bob-free pedaling while the adjustable rear travel soaks up the rough stuff. Shimano/SRAM drivetrain and FSA cranks will keep you in control on the ascents and the disc brakes will keep you in check on the descents. WTB rims with Kenda tires for added grip in the corners.
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: No matter what the trail throws your way, this bike will give you the confidence to tackle what’s ahead. Freeride suspension platform delivers smooth, bob-free pedaling while the adjustable rear travel soaks up the rough stuff. Shimano/SRAM drivetrain and FSA cranks will keep you in control on the ascents and the disc brakes will keep you in check on the descents. WTB rims with Kenda tires for added grip in the corners.
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• Lightweight and durable aluminum frame provides solid performance
  • SR Suntour front and rear adjustable suspension brings true MTB performance to the trail
  • Shimano/SRAM drivetrain with FSA cranks offers durable, reliable, all-around performance
  • Tektro hydraulic disc brakes provide low maintenance, all-weather stopping power in any terrain

item.Ecom.Product.Name: Mongoose Teocali Elite Mountain Bike
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: Mongoose shaved some weight off of last year’s Teocali frame and still managed to add beefier pivots and bearings to the 5.7 inches of tried and true FreeDrive rear wheel suspension. With an Easton cockpit, a heavy dose of Shimano/SRAM components and tough WTB wheels, this sharply dressed bike is perfectly built for those all-mountain, all-day-in-the-saddle rides.
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: Mongoose shaved some weight off of last year’s Teocali frame and still managed to add beefier pivots and bearings to the 5.7 inches of tried and true FreeDrive rear wheel suspension. With an Easton cockpit, a heavy dose of Shimano/SRAM components and tough WTB wheels, this sharply dressed bike is perfectly built for those all-mountain, all-day-in-the-saddle rides.
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• FreeDrive All Mountain 6061 aluminum full suspension frame with Zero Stack headset, forged dropouts, disc mount, replaceable derailleur hanger, anodized finish and 5.7” rear travel delivers super-stiff, lightweight and durable performance for all your epic backcountry adventures
  • Marzocchi XC600 TST-2 front suspension offers 140mm of travel and uses a top mounted 2-position compression adjuster to adjust for trail conditions and riding style
  • Fox Float RP/2 rear shock with two-piston ProPedal allows on-the-fly tuning for changing terrain while smoothing out the rough spots
  • SRAM X.7 Impulse Triggers and X.9 rear derailleur provide incredibly smooth, precise indexing and control
  • Shimano Hollowtech II cranks put pedaling power, acceleration and speed right at your feet
  • Easton aluminum handlebars, stem and Mongoose seatpost deliver core-level strength, style and performance
  • Hayes Stroker Trail V6 hydraulic disc brakes guarantee rapid, controlled and perfectly modulated stopping power in any condition
  • WTB Speed Disc All Mountain rims with 20mm hubs and Kenda Nevegal tires are built to handle anything you can dish out on the trail

item.Ecom.Product.Name: Nirve Classic Single Speed Bike
item.Ecom.Product.Price.Currency.Name: Dollars
item.Ecom.Product.Area.Name: Bikez
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription: From the local car show at the corner donut shop to the big time car meet in Carlisle, PA; the Classic and Kustom car culture is pure Americana. Drawing its influence from this popular lifestyle that fascinates enthusiasts worldwide, the Nirve Classic rolls into town with a vintage look and subtle appeal that’ll take you right back to the good ole’ days.
item.Ecom.Product.ShortDescription.Raw: From the local car show at the corner donut shop to the big time car meet in Carlisle, PA; the Classic and Kustom car culture is pure Americana. Drawing its influence from this popular lifestyle that fascinates enthusiasts worldwide, the Nirve Classic rolls into town with a vintage look and subtle appeal that’ll take you right back to the good ole’ days.
item.Ecom.Product.LongDescription:
• Durable, steel frame is strong, resilient and ensures a smooth ride through town
  • Wide, upright handlebars with shorty fenders and painted graphics give this ride a retro look
  • Roll pleat embossed seat with dual springs keeps your backside comfortable
  • Rear coaster brake delivers rapid braking power no matter what the forecast
